job.title: Test Automation Engineer with Security Clearance
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Defense & Space,Computer Software
job.description: Systems Test Engineer We are looking for multiple Systems Test Engineers focused on automation to work in a fastpaced team environment assisting test engineers to integrate and test spacecraft and instrument hardware You will write review update and implement test procedures as required use test and measurement equipment to test and troubleshoot spaceflight hardware as well as maintain required test engineering logs records and provide input to test summary reports Requirementsbrulli3 years of experience within systems testliliKnowledge and test experience using test automation applications and tools such as LabVIEW is desirableliliCurrent top secret security clearance requiredliliExperience in the testing of spaceflight instruments andor spacecraft or related electronic and electromechanical components and systems is desirableliliSpace or military experience highly desired but not requiredbrliul
